ModMetaData.name: Floor Equality
ModMetaData.author: lincore
ModMetaData.description:
Version 17.02
This small modification makes almost all indoor floorings equally beautiful as smoothed stone. The exception is wood floor, because it is very easy to build. Instead, I added parquet floor which is harder to build and costs more than twice the resources.
Changes: Adjusted beauty of vaniila floors - wood floor: from 0 to 2 - stone tile: from 2 to 3 - carpet: from 2 to 3
Added a new floor type: - parquet: requires 8 wood and 1200 work, has 3 beauty
2017/02/07: To offset the increased beauty-value of wood planks, I've decided to increase their cost: - from 3 to 5 wood - from 85 to 400 work
License: I release my work on this mod into the public domain and under the MIT license (pick one). The parquet floor was created using a set of wood textures from: webtreats.mysitemyway.com/tileable-light-wood-textures Licensed as CC-BY-2.0, creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/
